storyInfo: Following that hiccup, the group finally reaches their destination: the venue where the ceremony will be held.

attributes.content: Gyuh! That... That reaper's whirlwind... And that hairclip... Y-you're Gavial!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: The one and only!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Damn it. Just our luck, running into you.
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: But don't get ahead of yourself, Gavial! Not even you could shake our faith in thick tails!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Yeah, you're such hot shit! Keep running!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Doctor, let's move. I can sort them out the next time I see them.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial, how come you let them go?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: You used to chase down every last person in a fight and beat them until they saw stars.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Yeah. I used to do that.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But nah, now I just think they're kind of cute. Right, Doctor?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.options: No idea what you're saying, but I agree.;......;Cuter than you breaking them in half.

attributes.content: Might sound strange coming from me, but this place is full of nothing but boneheads.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Ah, whatever. Have to think all the goddamn time outside. I almost miss it here.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hey, Doctor, don't tell me you're a thick tail lover?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: 'Cause we're not gonna see eye-to-eye on that!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hah! Well, thinking they're cute won't stop me beating the tar outta them.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: They're not... uh... what's the word...? Mutually exclusive!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Gavial... you really have changed.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Mm? Hold on, Tomimi, you little brat.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Eh?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I go away for a couple years and I come back to find your tail's even fatter.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Wh-wh-whuh?!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Gonna try and tell me you're with thick tails, too?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: No no no no! It's not like I wanted it to grow so thick!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: *Whimper* I want a nice, thin tail just like Gavial's...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Well, shucks. *Clicks tongue* What a poor kid you are.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Though watching you fight back there, your Arts are pretty strong now, huh?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: R... Really? !
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Yeah. Come over to Rhodes Island and be an operator. Should be no problem for you.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Ope... rator?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Operators are, uh... Well, I guess it's a job. Like me, I'm a Medic Operator.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I remember you were still learning from the shamans when I left, right?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yep! I've been disciplining myself every day for you, Gavial, so one day you'd come back!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: For me?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Oh... um, by that, I mean, for when you come back so I could help you out! Like I did just now!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Well, damn. You really did help out, then. Well done.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Eheheh... I love when you compliment me.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Cool. Let's keep moving then. Do I remember the Temple's just ahead?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Mm-hm.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Eunectes has to be the Great Chief, c'mon. Look at how strong the whole tribe is.
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Yeah, and she's top of the pile. Everyone said if not Gavial, then Eunectes, and now Gavial's gone...
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Hey, over there!
attributes.name: Archosauria C

attributes.content: No way... Gavial?
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Hey, Gavial! You're finally back!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Whoa! Long time no see, huh!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hey, that feather on your waist is nice! Where'd it come from?
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Traded one of my weapons to Inam for it.
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Man, your tribe really has it good. Inam can get her hands on anything. I wish I could be with you guys too.
attributes.name: Archosauria C

attributes.content: Too bad. Inam hates crowds. But if there's anything you guys want, you can go through me!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Deal! ...Hey. Look over there.
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Is that... wait, it's Gavial!
attributes.name: Archosauria C

attributes.content: She's actually back? !
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Gavial! So you weren't dead!
attributes.name: Archosauria C

attributes.content: Alive and well, baby!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Brother, come on. Stop trying to make a show. You've got the Stone Disease and all. Just go back home and lie down, okay?
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Who cares! What's a little disease in the face of the ceremony?!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: A little disease is still disease! And think about how bad it'd be for us if you went out there and showed everyone the rocks growing on your tail!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Look, Gavial might be gone, but now Zumama's sure to be the next Great Chief!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: That's the part I care about! I need to witness the moment Zumama becomes Chief!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Damnit, I should have listened to Zumama... huh?  Brother, look over there!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: It couldn't be. Is that... Gavial? !
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Has she come back to become Great Chief?
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry, but now I HAVE to see the ceremony.
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: Yeah. I don't think anyone can miss this now.
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Huh? Those two look like they're from the Eunectes tribe...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: It really is Gavial! You're finally back!
attributes.name: Archosauria B

attributes.content: I always believed in you, Gavial!
attributes.name: Archosauria A

attributes.content: Hey, everyone, look! It's Gavial!
attributes.name: Archosauria C

attributes.content: Gavial! Gavial! Gavial!
attributes.name: Archosauria

attributes.content: Whew, what a rowdy bunch... Looks like we oughta pick up the pace.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Mm-hm! Everyone loves the ceremony, after all. And everyone loves Gavial too!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Oh. Gavial, look at that sign there.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Lemme see. Tch, goddamned scratchy handwriting... Oh, look at that. It says 'Mahuizzotia.'
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: We're here.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Wait. What gives with the music?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: And for that matter, why do I recognize it...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Wait! Doctor, this is an AUS song, isn't it?!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Well, damn.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I'm not totally sure myself, but I've definitely heard people playing this before.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Snap out of it, Doctor! Don't just walk in!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Lots of AUS fans at Rhodes Island. That's gotta be it.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Ah. Yep, this is an AUS song.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: How do you know what AUS is? !
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Around this time last year, a bunch of strange people calling themselves AUS came here from the outside.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: They held a concert at Inam's tribe first. After that, a whole lot of Tiacauh started treating them like heralds of the Mahuizzotia.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Later on, they were asked to stay for a long performance in the Temple surroundings.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I got to hear them once. Their music really was powerful, and beautiful... you could feel their awesome Arts, too.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Ever since, lots of Tiacauh fell in love with this kind of music.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: And then suddenly one day, they disappeared. Everyone said they'd gone back to their ancestors' embrace.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: But I knew they'd only left, same as Gavial had.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: The music playing right now should be coming from those 'speaker' things they left here. I think they also left behind some of their albums?
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Speakers?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yep. They need Arts to function, so only priests and shamans can actually use them, and most of them are in Inam's tribe.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Hahaha! Now that's a band of freewheelers.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Can't deny, their songs really get up in there. I haven't even stepped in and they've got my blood running hot. I think I'm beginning to like them!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Let's go, Doctor! We're gonna hear some music and enjoy a hell of a show!
attributes.name: Gavial
